fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Write FAMILY NAME, FIRST NAME, MIDDLE NAME as on valid ID.

fields.label: Present Address
fields.summary: House/Unit/Street, City/Municipality, Province. Provide Tel/CP No. and TIN if available.

fields.label: Birth Details
fields.summary: Birth Date (MM/DD/YY) and Birthplace (City/Municipality, Province).

fields.label: Nationality & Gender
fields.summary: State nationality and tick Gender (F/M).

fields.label: Physical Stats
fields.summary: Height (cm) and Weight (kg).

fields.label: Type of Application (TOA)
fields.summary: Mark one: New, Delinquent/Dormant, Change Classification (Non-Prof↔Prof), Foreign License Conversion, Renewal, Duplicate, Revision of Records, Others (specify).

fields.label: Type of License Applied For
fields.summary: Mark Student Permit, Non-Professional, Professional, or Conductor.

fields.label: Restriction Code (RC)
fields.summary: Tick allowable vehicle categories (e.g., MC/Tricycles; up to 4500 kg GVW; above 4500 kg; automatic clutch only; articulated, etc.).

fields.label: Educational Attainment
fields.summary: Tick highest: Informal, Elementary, High School, Vocational, College, Post-Graduate.

fields.label: Driving Skill Acquired Thru
fields.summary: Select Driving School, Licensed Private Person, or Schooling.

fields.label: Blood Type
fields.summary: Write known blood type (e.g., O+, A−).

fields.label: Eyes / Complexion / Built / Hair
fields.summary: Select the option that best describes you (e.g., Eyes: Black/Brown/Gray/Others; Complexion: Light/Medium/Heavy/Dark).

fields.label: Organ Donor
fields.summary: Tick YES if you consent to be an organ donor; otherwise NO.

fields.label: Driving Conditions
fields.summary: Tick if applicable: With Corrective Lenses, With Hearing Aid, Daylight Driving Only, Drive Only w/ Special Equipment for Upper/Lower Limbs, Drive Only w/ Customized Vehicle.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Single, Married, Widower/Widow, Separated, or Others (specify).

fields.label: Parents / Spouse
fields.summary: Provide Father’s, Mother’s, and, if applicable, Spouse’s full names (indicate even if deceased).

fields.label: Employer Details
fields.summary: Employer’s Business Name, Address, and Telephone No. (if employed).

fields.label: Revision of Records
fields.summary: For Change of Address, Change Civil Status, Change Name, Change Date of Birth, etc., tick the correct item and attach supporting documents.

fields.label: Previous Name
fields.summary: If your current name differs from your previous license, write your former full name.

fields.label: Applicant’s Certification
fields.summary: Sign above printed name to certify information is true and correct.

fields.label: LTO Evaluator/Approver
fields.summary: To be accomplished by LTO personnel only (CSR/Evaluator). Attach required supporting documents.

fields.label: Computation of Fees
fields.summary: Application Fee, Computer Fee, License Fee, Additional Restriction Code Fee; totals computed by LTO.

fields.label: Scoring & Passing
fields.summary: Start with 100 points; deductions for errors. Passing score is 70. Automatic failure for striking a car/pedestrian/object or causing near collision.

fields.label: Assessment Areas
fields.summary: Pre-Driving Check-up (10 pts), Driving Skills (50), Observance to Traffic Rules (40). Specific demerits recorded by examiner.
